administrator supervisor and employee using Drupal and CSS Created DRUPAL modules for quick approvals billing and pay rates custom reporting and payroll Integration Involved in implementing MVC architecture to segregate business logic from the view using OOP in PHP 5 Created report generator that queried the MYSQL database for userspecified information Used AngularJS including authoring code with W3C Validator Involved in fixing FrontEnd issues with the layouts Environment PHP5 JavaScript Zend Framework HTML5CSS3 AngularJS SQL MySQL LAMP JQuery Apache web server LINUX Drupal groups of multiple users with Drupal CMS Worked heavily on DRUPAL CMS development and developed various custom modules Site content migration from Drupal 6 to Drupal 7 and Drupal 8 Implemented
